pr_title: Add doc support for classes and abstract objects

timeline.message: Change objects to class, add abstract objects

timeline.bodyText: @shehan360 do we need check? Below for each won't execute if there are 0 entries?
timeline.author: keizer619

replies.bodyText: Yes the check can be removed
replies.author: shehan360

timeline.author: pramodya1994

timeline.bodyText:
handlebars.registerHelper("addColon",
                    (Helper<PageContext>) (page, options) -> page.getClass() == ClassPageContext.class
                            || page.getClass() == RecordPageContext.class || page.getClass() == ClientPageContext.class
                            || page.getClass() == ListenerPageContext.class);
Can't we simplify L152 - 160 like this?
timeline.author: pramodya1994

timeline.bodyText: Access can be package-private for both consts
timeline.author: pramodya1994

timeline.bodyText: make this a static final constant or private & provide getters if need to access
timeline.author: pramodya1994
